alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 9:29AM EST until February 19 at 10:30AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Western Chemung County in central New York... Southern Steuben County in central New York... * Until 1030 AM EST. * At 929 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from Urbana to near Jasper, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions. Zero visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Elmira, Corning, Southport, Big Flats, Horseheads, Bath, Elmira Heights, Campbell, Caton and Lindley. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 37 and 57. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
